Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener

    public class Game
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.ActionListener
    This class models Game objects which extend JComponent and implement MouseListener and ActionListener
    Author:
    ShaynaSnyder
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
